description: After Mu Shiyan had a taste of Sheng Jin, he became addicted and could never give up! After being tricked by Sheng Jin and betrayed, this woman became a thorn in his heart, which could not be pulled out and could not be forgotten. Later, Mu Shiyan realized that this desire was called – paranoia. First abuse and then love! >
